products_dry.name: Egg Cream Mask Hydration Set (5 pack)
products_dry.description: Revive dry, dull skin with these hydrating microfiber sheet masks. With protein-packed egg yolk and egg white extracts, this formula will help tighten pores and boost cell turnover due to it’s high amino acid content. Hydrating coconut water and brightening niacinamide round out the formula, to make this a perfect solution for skin that’s in need of a boost.

products_dry.name: Wide Awake Brightening Eye Cream
products_dry.description: Key ingredients include date seed extract, which is high in antioxidant properties that boost the look of vitality, and avocado protein extract to boost hydration and moisture barrier protection. Hyaluronic acid visibly improves skin’s hydration and suppleness, while peptides plump for an improved appearance for tired skin.

products_dry.name: UV Cut SPF 50+PA++++ Natural Sun Cushion
products_dry.description: No more excuses! This unique cushion compact makes applying sunscreen on-the-go and reapplying during the day easy. The physical formula effectively blocks UV rays while repairing and soothing sun damaged skin with Natural Protector, a patented ingredient.

products_dry.name: pH Balancing Watery Cleansing Oil
products_dry.description: Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. pH of 4.7~6.7. Cruelty free and vegan. Formulated without parabens, sulfates, alcohol, artificial color and fragrance, essential oils and mineral oils.

products_dry.name: Real Aqua Balancing Ampoule
products_dry.description: Layer more moisture into your skin with this ultra-hydrating, lightweight ampoule. Meant to be combined with an existing routine for an additional boost, this ampoule is particularly beneficial due to the patented N4 Complex, combining 4 different plants to deliver and lock in water within the skin barrier. The N4 Complex includes houttuynia cordata extract to calm and hydrate, and licorice root extract to soothe and even out the skin tone.

products_dry.name: Real Aqua Balancing Cream
products_dry.description: Replenish and rebalance dehydrated, sensitized skin with this nourishing-yet-lightweight moisturizer. This calming cream delivers and locks in water within the skin barrier effectively with the patented N4 Complex. Houttuynia cordata extract calms and hydrates, while licorice root extract soothes and brightens.

products_dry.name: Wonder Balm
products_dry.description: Packed with ceramides and amino acids, this multi-use hair balm is great to revive and hydrate damaged, weak strands. Protect hair from damage and breakage that comes from daily styling. This balm is additionally formulated with macadamia oil, silk protein and aloe extract to deeply nourish and soften locks. Cetearyl alcohol is a long-chain fatty alcohol, which is different from drying alcohols -- this type actually helps to hydrate and smooth the hair. This product works as both a rinse-out treatment on wet hair after shampooing, or as a hair butter applied while drying hair to help smooth and de-frizz all day long.

products_dry.name: Green Tangerine Vita C Dark Circle Eye Cream
products_dry.description: All the brightening benefits of vitamin C are packed into this potent eye cream from trusted K-beauty staple, Goodal. Gentle and safe for use around the eye area, this formula’s hero ingredient is green tangerine extract, which has 10x more vitamin C derivatives than a standard tangerine. With added adenosine and peptides to help improve elasticity and firmness to alleviate the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, this is a much-loved eye cream to address many common skin concerns.

products_dry.name: Laser Sunscreen 100 SPF 50+/PA+++
products_dry.description: This lightweight anti-aging sunscreen is a fast favorite! This physical SPF (containing zinc oxide) protects from damaging UVA and UVB rays, which also contribute to signs of premature aging. Unique to this sunscreen from Cell Fusion C, the formula includes peptides, ceramide and collagen to help regenerate skin and keep the barrier firm and healthy. Lavender extract provides a light, refreshing scent and the formula leaves little to no white cast. Ingredients are all EWG Green Grade, making this SPF a great, gentle option for all types of skin.

products_dry.name: Egg-zyme Whipped Foam
products_dry.description: Deeply hydrate skin from the first step in your routine with this whipped foam cleanser. Egg yolk and egg white extracts purify and clear pores to help provide a clean canvas for the skin. Egg white (albumen) extract also includes lysozymes, which are antimicrobial and dissolve on the skin for a more effective protective cleanse. Hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid delivers hydration deeper into the skin, while centella asiatica and ceramide NP soothe and calm while improving the skin’s barrier function.

products_dry.name: On The Bright Side Moisturizer
products_dry.description: Cruelty-free and vegan. This facial moisturizer is formulated to the Soko Glam Clean Standard. This product has a pH level of 5.5 ~ 6.Good (Skin) Days™ is Soko Glam's first exclusively owned brand created by Soko Glam Labs. Committed to approachable, effective formulations that are designed with you and your skin care journey in mind, Good (Skin) Days™ is what your routine has been waiting for.

products_dry.name: Real Ferment Micro Essence
products_dry.description: This fragrance-free fermented treatment is also formulated with 17% birch juice to add hydration and 9% rice extracts to illuminate skin from within. Full of natural brighteners, antioxidants and cell-communicating ingredients, this essence is the key to glowing, supple honey skin. To maximize results and benefits use with Micro Serum.

products_dry.name: Moisture Boost Deep Sea Minis Set
products_dry.description: Featuring Tony Moly favorites infused with skin-rejuvenating sea water, algae and hyaluronic acid, this ultra-hydrating set will cleanse, soothe and moisturize to provide skin the ultimate glow!

products_dry.name: MadeCera Cream Double Essence Toner
products_dry.description: If you’re struggling with dehydrated, dull skin or uneven texture and redness, the MadeCera Double Essence Toner is an ideal choice. Pairs perfectly with best-selling MadeCera Cream - a former Best of K-Beauty™ winner!

products_dry.name: Your Youth Regimen Kit → Dry
products_dry.description: Five essentials that work in harmony to revitalize dry, dehydrated skin, replenish vital moisture, and gently cleanse for deeply conditioned skin. Omega-rich fatty acids, vitamin C, and adaptogens combine to soothe skin and lock in moisture.

products_dry.name: MEDIHEAL X LINE FRIENDS N.M.F Aquaring Ampoule Mask Set
products_dry.description: Dry skin doesn’t stand a chance against this ultra-hydrating face mask set! Designed in collaboration with the popular Line Friends characters and formulated by Mediheal’s dermatologists and estheticians, it’s a perfect pairing.

products_dry.name: Probiotics Double Action Serum
products_dry.description: The Probiotic Serum is formulated with skin-friendly ferments in the form of probiotics and prebiotics, including over 20% lactobacillus ferment lysate, to create an optimal acidic environment for the skin and helping to smooth and plump fine lines and wrinkles. It deeply hydrates with hyaluronic acid and glycerin, while gently exfoliating with lactic acid to provide an overall brighter and bouncier-appearing complexion. This is the white-colored serum on the left side of the bottle.

products_dry.name: Licorice pH Balancing Intensive Eye Cream
products_dry.description: Created exclusively in collaboration with Acwell, the hydrating formula features licorice water and licorice extract to brighten dark circles and hyper-pigmentation. Peptides and antioxidant-rich ingredients like glutathione, green tea and blueberry extract provide anti-aging benefits and caffeine tightens and reduces inflammation and puffiness. The formula is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and is free of artificial fragrances, parabens, sulphates, artificial colors, animal products, mineral oil, and essential oils.

products_dry.name: Skin Pot Cleansing Balm
products_dry.description: This gentle cleansing balm is enriched with hemp seed oil to remove all unwanted impurities while hydrating and repairing damage with naturally occurring omega-3 fatty acids. The formula works to reduce sebum production and soothe inflammation, even after the formula is rinsed off. Pomegranate fruit extract kills harmful bacteria that can clog pores and irritate skin, helping to enrich the skin’s microbiome with healthy bacteria for a thoroughly cleansed, glowing complexion.

products_dry.name: Freshly Juiced Vitamin E Mask
products_dry.description: You'll love this mask if you can't get enough of vitamin C since vitamin E stabilizes the vitamin C ingredient and helps your vitamin C product work better. It also works to protect your skin from sun sensitivity after application of any vitamin C products. Light enough to be used also as a day time moisturizer on parched skin, this unique mask will become your go-to for smooth, balanced and brighter skin.

products_dry.name: Rice Pure Gel and Cream
products_dry.description: Get the best of both worlds to soothe, strengthen and hydrate skin with the Rice Pure Gel and Cream. Calm irritated, stressed skin with the refreshing gel, infused with soothing green tea extract and summer snowflake bulb extract. The hydrating cream is formulated with antioxidant-rich mung bean extract paired with nourishing rice extract and moisturizing fig extract. This unique formula can be customized to your specific skin needs, so you can use one or both formulas together to keep skin bright and healthy. Especially great for dry and sensitive skin types.

products_dry.name: Fundamental Water Gel Cream
products_dry.description: Deeply hydrate and strengthen parched skin with this water-based moisturizer that has an extremely lightweight texture with a refreshing, light finish. 63.7% Jeju green tea water effectively calms skin quickly, while antioxidants help to combat against free radical damage, to help keep skin supple and youthful. Rounding out the formulation are amino acids and panthenol (vitamin B5) to keep skin smooth and super-hydrated for a bouncy, soft appearance.

products_dry.name: Fresh Herb Origin Serum
products_dry.description: Plant-based ingredients including a patented antioxidant component called Sepicalm (a blend of water lily extract and amino acids) and a pore complex of lemongrass, lime peel and applemint, work together to target signs of aging and to tighten enlarged pores. Aloe leaf water provides additional moisturizing and anti-inflammatory benefits, while non-comedogenic oils help promote a radiant complexion.

products_dry.name: Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence
products_dry.description: Heal and nourish red, sensitized skin with this ultra-concentrated essence that’s formulated with 100% artemisia extract (also known as mugwort). The herb has powerful anti-inflammatory properties and is rich in antioxidants. To effectively extract the most active form of the ingredient, the brand used a unique double-fermentation process in both warm and cold environments.

products_dry.name: Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cream 12
products_dry.description: The calming moisturizer from Make Prem has a slightly acidic pH of 5.5 and is free of artificial fragrances and colors, animal products, parabens, sulfates, mineral oil and silicone.

products_dry.name: Bubble Lip Scrub
products_dry.description: A lip scrub like you’ve never seen before! This innovative formulation takes the lip pampering experience to new heights with a unique bubbling effect. Instead of the abrasive texture of traditional lip scrubs, this lip scrub exfoliates the delicate skin on your lips with the combination of fun little bubbles and fruit extracts.

products_dry.name: D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
products_dry.description: This bamboo mask is soaked in a unique creamy serum that boosts skin’s hydration levels with nourishing ingredients like jojoba oil, squalene, and 19 amino acids and peptides. The result is soft and supple skin and a youthful glow. The formula is free of artificial colors, parabens, sulfates, mineral oil and silicone. Each set includes 5 single-use sheet masks.

products_dry.name: Rich Moist Soothing Tencel Sheet Mask
products_dry.description: The formula of this popular mask has recently been upgraded and now offers a 360-degree approach to treating dry or sensitive skin. The essence is packed with ceramides help strengthen a weakened skin barrier, while aloe vera and centella asiatica extract provide a calming effect.
